titleStmt.title: Ordered by the Lords spiritual and temporal in Parliament assembled, that no papist, or reputed papist, do presume to come into the lobby, painted chamber, court of requests, or Westminster Hall, during this session of Parliament ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 6 lines of text.
At head of title: Die Sabbathi 15 ̊Junij 1689.
